mean_cn: n. 道德，道德观；道德规范，伦理体系
mean_en: principles concerning right and wrong or good and bad behaviour; the degree to which something is right or wrong, good or bad, etc. according to moral principles
sentence: Talking on mobile phone when watching movies is of no morality.
sentence_trans: 看电影时接电话是不道德的。
word_etyma: mor道德 + ality表示状态、情况、性质 → morality道德观
